thread.title: Cheech and Chong's careers highlighted at Grammy Museum

title: Cheech and Chong's careers highlighted at Grammy Museum
text:
Cheech and Chong's careers highlighted at Grammy Museum 5:14am IST - 01:47 
In time for 4/20, a new exhibition is put on at the Grammy Museum in Downtown Los Angeles celebrating the cult stoner film ''Up in Smoke''. Rough Cut - no reporter narration ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
In time for 4/20, a new exhibition is put on at the Grammy Museum in Downtown Los Angeles celebrating the cult stoner film "Up in Smoke".
